description: Evaluates device positions against geofence geometries from a given geofence collection. The event forecasts three states for which a device can be in relative to a geofence: ENTER: If a device is outside of a geofence, but would breach the fence if the device is moving at its current speed within time horizon window. EXIT: If a device is inside of a geofence, but would breach the fence if the device is moving at its current speed within time horizon window. IDLE: If a device is inside of a geofence, and the device is not moving.

parameters.name: CollectionName
parameters.description: The name of the geofence collection.

parameters.name: DeviceState
parameters.description: The device's state, including current position and speed. The device's position. (float) --- Speed (float) --- The device's speed.

parameters.name: DistanceUnit
parameters.description: The distance unit used for the NearestDistance property returned in a forecasted event. The measurement system must match for DistanceUnit and SpeedUnit; if Kilometers is specified for DistanceUnit, then SpeedUnit must be KilometersPerHour. Default Value: Kilometers.

parameters.name: SpeedUnit
parameters.description: The speed unit for the device captured by the device state. The measurement system must match for DistanceUnit and SpeedUnit; if Kilometers is specified for DistanceUnit, then SpeedUnit must be KilometersPerHour. Default Value: KilometersPerHour.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token specifying which page of results to return in the response. If no token is provided, the default page is the first page. Default value: null.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: An optional limit for the number of resources returned in a single call. Default value: 20

nested_items.name: GeofenceId
nested_items.description: The geofence identifier pertaining to the forecasted event.

nested_items.name: IsDeviceInGeofence
nested_items.description: Indicates if the device is located within the geofence.

nested_items.name: NearestDistance
nested_items.description: The closest distance from the device's position to the geofence.

nested_items.name: EventType
nested_items.description: The event type, forecasting three states for which a device can be in relative to a geofence:

nested_items.name: ForecastedBreachTime
nested_items.description: The forecasted time the device will breach the geofence in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token specifying which page of results to return in the response. If no token is provided, the default page is the first page.

nested_items.name: DistanceUnit
nested_items.description: The distance unit for the forecasted events.

nested_items.name: SpeedUnit
nested_items.description: The speed unit for the forecasted events.
